featured.text: While the Iron Curtain was still in place under the communist government, Prague was ＿29＿ visited by foreigners.

definition.zh_def: 共產主義者，主張社會財產公有，消除階級差異的政治理念或其支持者。
definition.en_def: A person who supports or advocates for communism, a political ideology that seeks to establish a classless society in which all property is publicly owned.
definition.example: The communist party organized a rally to promote their vision of a classless society.
